title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: New South Korean airline adds fifth destination in US
items.description: Air Premia will add Washington, D.C., flights starting in April.

items.title: Hawaiian Airlines set for Oneworld debut in April, pledges $600 million for airport, airplane and lounge upgrades
items.description: Hawaiian Airlines is planning a major $600 million upgrade spree in the wake of being acquired by Alaska Airlines in 2024.

items.title: United Airlines CEO hints at 'new aircraft types' amid plan to 'shake-up the industry'
items.description: United Airlines CEO Scott Kirby is hinting at some "surprises" to come from the carrier in 2026.

items.title: How to transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards points to Singapore Airlines KrisFlyer

items.title: 45 new Hyatt hotels where you can get 500 extra points per night
items.description: World of Hyatt offers its members 500 bonus points per night at select new hotels for a limited time after the hotel opens. Here's how to get those po...
